title: Ardent Censer
body: Been playing sona lately and buying ardent censer on her but the passive from ardent ( the attack speed part ) doesn't seem to be working when i heal or shield my team. Just wondering if this may be a bug or i'm just not reading the passive right and doesn't work on sona like that.

replies.body: Tthink i may have just been looking at it wrong, seem to be working on Janna. just ignore this thread xD
Could be single target so it might not buff everyone but im not sure.
